source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video captures a low-angle, ground-level view of a bustling street in what appears to be London, England. The camera remains stationary as various vehicles, including cars, a black cab, a red double-decker bus, and a tour bus, drive past. The street is framed on both sides by tall, elegant, historic buildings under a bright blue sky, with a Union Jack flag flying from one of the buildings on the right.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: Please change "low-angle" to "level-angle" in the video caption.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: Please change "low-angle" to "level-angle" in the video caption.

The street is framed on both sides by tall, elegant, historic buildings under a bright blue sky, with a Union Jack flag flying from one of the buildings on the right.
